line_1: With what my lady eats, and how she rests:
line_2: Will entertain me, till his lordship's drest,

line_1: While drowzy Man in Sleep unactive rests,
line_2: Not half so happy as the watchful Beasts,

line_1: And o'er the flame the sputt'ring fruit he rests,
line_2: Placing green sods to seat his coming guests;

line_1: QUOTH William, Sir, the question rests
